input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
3dRose tm_157398_1" Aged 65 Years to Perfection Happy 65Th Birthday" Travel Mug, 14 oz, Multicolor

Product specifications:
14Oz capacity
Made of stainless steel
Easy-Grip handle with thumb rest
Slide opening lid with slanted drinking surface
Not microwave safe, hand washing is recommended

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This travel mug is a great way to show your loved one how much you care! This aged 65 years to perfection happy 65th birthday travel mug is a great way to mark any special occasion. This travel mug is made of stainless steel with a slide opening lid and easy-grip handle with thumb rest. The 14 oz. travel mug has a slanted drinking surface and is not microwave safe. Hand washing is recommended. The aged 65 years to perfection happy 65th birthday travel mug is a great gift for that special someone in your life.
input_text.Response B: A travel mug that expresses the sentiment that age is just a number!  The mug features the words "Aged 65 Years to Perfection" with a colorful number "65" on a white background, and also has a multicolored rim.  This 14 oz mug is made of durable stainless steel and has an easy-grip handle with thumb rest, as well as a slide opening lid with slanted drinking surface.  It's not microwave safe, so hand washing is recommended.  A great gift for the birthday girl or guy who is proud of their age!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: response B was a more understanding and likeable response even though they were quite similar
